mapper.insert: insert into itda_user (userId, userPw, userName, userBirth, userGender, userPhone, userAddress1, userAddress2, userPost, userEmail, userCategory, userJoindate, statusId, userProfile) values(#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userBirth}, #{userGender}, #{userPhone}, #{userAddress1}, #{userAddress2}, #{userPost}, #{userEmail}, #{userCategory}, SYSDATE, 1, null)
